data.text:
@calroscow Just speaking from my experience it took about a month to get over it after Christmas.

I was out of energy for about while.

@squashed_pea Ah! Tbh I defo defo made myself worse by going back to work and gym as soon as testing negative. But then I didn't feel ill! However I defo felt ill up until this weekend. So I probs should be taking it a bit easy but thought exercise might help. Hm. It's definitely horrid virus.

@calroscow Literally saw this just after your tweet - don’t know if it’s useful info? Hope you feel better soon either way.

https://t.co/BmDLvFZHLT

@calroscow Take it easy 🙏Cal, don't push yourself too hard.

I got Covid March 2020 before vaccines and it took a year for my breathing to get back to close to normal even though I lost weight & was exercising more than before I was ill. It is madness to let this rip through us all.
